We are open from 9 AM to 9 PM every day.
You can return any item within 30 days of purchase. Please ensure the item is in its original condition.
We offer free shipping on orders over $50. Standard shipping is $5, and express shipping is $15.

patterns: What is the status of my order?
responses: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email. If you need further assistance, please provide your order number.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal.

patterns: Do you have this item available?
responses: Please provide the product name or SKU, and I will check the availability for you.

patterns: I need help with my order
Can I speak to a representative?
responses: You can contact our support team at support@wprstore.com or call us at 1-800-123-4567.

patterns: What is the best product for me?
I'm looking for a good product.
responses: Sure, please provide some details on what you're looking for, and I'll recommend the best products for you.
We have a 20% discount on all electronics. Check our 'Deals' section for more offers.

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
How does your loyalty program work?
responses: Yes, we have a loyalty program. You earn points with every purchase that can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

patterns: How do I get a refund?
Can I get my money back?
responses: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. You will be notified via email once the refund is processed.

patterns: How do I track my order?
Can I see where my order is?
responses: You can track your order by logging into your account and going to 'My Orders'.

patterns: How do I cancel my order?
responses: To cancel your order, please contact our support team as soon as possible. If the order hasn't been shipped, we can process the cancellation.
Yes, you can exchange items within 30 days of purchase. Please contact our support team to initiate the exchange.

We apologize for the delay. Sometimes, due to high demand or logistical issues, orders might take longer to deliver. Please check your email for any updates or contact our support team for more information.

patterns: How do I create an account?
responses: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right corner of the homepage and fill in your details.

patterns: What's the price of ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR 16?
How much does the ROG Strix SCAR 16 cost?
responses: The price of the ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR 16 is £3100.

patterns: Tell me about ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR 16
What are the features of G634JZ-N4034W?
responses: The ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR 16 is a powerful gaming laptop designed for gamers and game developers.
It features up to an Intel® Core™ i9 processor and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4080 Laptop GPU, along with a 16-inch QHD+ display.
With support for up to 64GB of DDR5 RAM and 4TB of PCIe Gen4x4 storage, it's ideal for gaming, streaming, and content creation.

patterns: What are the specifications of ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR 16?
Specs of the ROG Strix SCAR 16
responses: Processor: 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i9-13980HX Processor
Memory: 32GB DDR5 4800Mhz
Storage: 1TB M.2 NVMe™ PCIe® 4.0 SSD (supports up to 4TB)
Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4080 Laptop GPU, 12GB GDDR6
Display: 16-inch QHD+ 16:10 (2560 x 1600, WQXGA), 240Hz refresh rate, G-Sync
Operating System: Windows 11 Home
Battery: 90WHrs, 4-cell Li-ion

patterns: What's the price of HP EliteBook 840 G5?
How much does the EliteBook 840 G5 cost?
responses: The price of the HP EliteBook 840 G5 is £310.

patterns: Tell me about HP EliteBook 840 G5
What are the features of EliteBook 840 G5?
responses: The HP EliteBook 840 G5 is a professional laptop featuring an Intel Core i5 processor and Intel Iris Xe Graphics.
It comes with a 14-inch Full HD display, Windows 11 Pro, and offers up to 16GB of DDR4 RAM and a 1TB SSD for fast performance.
With features like a backlit keyboard, fingerprint reader, and extensive security options, it's designed for business and productivity.

patterns: What are the specifications of HP EliteBook 840 G5?
List the specs of EliteBook 840 G5
responses: Processor: Intel Core i5-8350U G5, up to 4.2 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost
Memory: 16GB DDR4 RAM
Storage: 1TB SSD PCIe 3.0 x4 NVMe
Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics
Display: 14-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080), anti-glare, 250 nits
Operating System: Windows 11 Pro
Battery: 53 Wh, up to 14.5 hours of battery life

patterns: What's the price of Apple MacBook Pro 16.2"?
How much does the MacBook Pro 16.2" cost?
responses: The price of the Apple MacBook Pro 16.2" is £3000.

patterns: Tell me about Apple MacBook Pro 16.2"
What are the features of MacBook Pro 16.2"?
responses: The new MacBook Pro delivers game-changing performance for pro users. Choose the powerful M1 Max to supercharge pro-level workflows while getting amazing battery life.
It features a 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology, a powerful Apple M1 Max chip, and up to 64GB of unified memory.
With up to 21 hours of battery life, a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, six-speaker sound system, and an array of ports, it's ideal for creative professionals.

patterns: What are the specifications of Apple MacBook Pro 16.2"?
List the specs of MacBook Pro 16.2"
responses: Processor: Apple M1 Max chip
Memory: Up to 64GB of unified memory
Storage: Up to 8TB SSD
Graphics: Up to 32-core GPU
Display: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 3456 x 2234 resolution, ProMotion technology
Operating System: macOS Monterey
Battery: Up to 21 hours
Ports: Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, HDMI port, SDXC card slot, MagSafe 3 port, headphone jack

patterns: What's the price of Apple 13.6" MacBook Air (M2, Midnight)?
How much does the MacBook Air M2 cost?
Price of Apple 13.6" MacBook Air M2?
responses: The price of the Apple 13.6" MacBook Air (M2, Midnight) is £1500.

patterns: Tell me about Apple 13.6" MacBook Air (M2, Midnight)
What are the features of MacBook Air M2?
responses: The Apple 13.6" MacBook Air now features the Apple M2 chip, offering significant performance improvements over its predecessor.
It comes with an 8-core CPU, 10-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine, 8GB of unified RAM, and a 512GB SSD.
With a 13.6" Liquid Retina Display, 1080p FaceTime HD camera, and up to 18 hours of battery life, it's powerful yet portable.

patterns: What are the specifications of Apple 13.6" MacBook Air (M2, Midnight)?
List the specs of MacBook Air M2
Specs of the MacBook Air M2
responses: Processor: Apple M2 8-Core Chip
Memory: 8GB Unified RAM
Storage: 512GB SSD
Graphics: 10-Core GPU
Display: 13.6-inch 2560 x 1664 Liquid Retina Display
Operating System: macOS
Battery: Up to 18 hours
Ports: Two Thunderbolt 3 ports, MagSafe 3 port
Camera: 1080p FaceTime HD camera
Other Features: Backlit Magic Keyboard, Touch ID, Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.0, three-mic array

patterns: How do I reset my password?
responses: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions.
